doc:
Louise Lovely https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louise_Lovely 0 Louise Lovely (born Nellie Louise Carbasse; 28 February 1895 – 18 March 1980) was an Australian film actress. She is credited by film historians for being the first Australian actress to have a successful career in Hollywood, signing a contract with Universal Pictures in the United States in 1914. Lovely would appear in a total of fifty American films and ten Australian films before retiring from acting in 1925. Louise_Lovely ( born Nellie_Louise_Carbasse ; 28_February_1895 – 18_March_1980 ) was an_Australian_film_actress . She is_credited by film_historians for being the_first_Australian_actress to_have a_successful_career in Hollywood , signing a_contract with Universal_Pictures in the_United_States in 1914 . Lovely would_appear in a_total of fifty_American_films and ten_Australian_films before retiring from acting in 1925 .
